verbs.description: In an effort to [V: expose] [ARG1: the real motives behind President Donald Trump 's recent push to rescue Chinese telecommunications firm ZTE] , more than 60 Democratic representatives signed an open letter demanding an ethics investigation into President Trump 's ties to China .

In an effort to expose the real motives behind [ARG0: President Donald Trump 's] recent push to [V: rescue] [ARG1: Chinese telecommunications firm ZTE] , more than 60 Democratic representatives signed an open letter demanding an ethics investigation into President Trump 's ties to China .

[ARGM-PRP: In an effort to expose the real motives behind President Donald Trump 's recent push to rescue Chinese telecommunications firm ZTE] , [ARG0: more than 60 Democratic representatives] [V: signed] [ARG1: an open letter demanding an ethics investigation into President Trump 's ties to China] .

In an effort to expose the real motives behind President Donald Trump 's recent push to rescue Chinese telecommunications firm ZTE , more than 60 Democratic representatives signed [ARG0: an open letter] [V: demanding] [ARG1: an ethics investigation into President Trump 's ties to China] .
